name: grunt-react-native
description: A grunt plugin for launching the React Native packager and bundle your files for relase

scripts.test: cat node_modules/.bin/react-native && npm run clean && npm run expected && npm run expected_minified && grunt test
scripts.expected: mkdir -p test/expected && react-native bundle --entry-file test/fixtures/index.ios.js --bundle-output test/expected/index.ios.bundle --platform ios --assets-dest test/expected && react-native bundle --entry-file test/fixtures/index.android.js --bundle-output test/expected/index.android.bundle --platform android --assets-dest test/expected
scripts.expected_minified: mkdir -p test/expected && react-native bundle --entry-file test/fixtures/index.ios.js --bundle-output test/expected/index_minified.ios.bundle --platform ios --assets-dest test/expected --dev false && react-native bundle --entry-file test/fixtures/index.android.js --bundle-output test/expected/index_minified.android.bundle --platform android --assets-dest test/expected --dev false
